channel.title: Case Dialogue

item.title: Case Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

I’m having an issue when I’m unable to wrap my head around the Dialogue and how it’s made up, I’m hoping to make my next server really interactive with dialogue.

case 7: /*NEED TO CHANGE FOR GUARD*/ c.sendFrame200(4883, 591); c.sendFrame126(c.GetNpcName(c.NpcTalkTo), 4884); c.sendFrame126("Well, if you find somone who does want runes, please", 4885); c.sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886); c.sendFrame75(c.NpcTalkTo, 4883); c.sendFrame164(4882); c.NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

From what I understand the 4883 is the NPC ID and the 591 corresponds to the mood with the NPC’s facial expression etc…
2nd line I assume fetches the NPC name… 4884 I don’t understand unless it’s something that relates to 4883.

Can anyone just explain it so I can wrap my head around the NPC dialogue. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: 30 August 2009, 23:45:26[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic
